TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SupportedOSPlatformAttribute extends System.Runtime.Versioning.OSPlatformAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class SupportedOSPlatformAttribute Inherits OSPlatformAttribute

[<System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Event | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Module | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)>]

summary.span: 指示指定的平台或操作系统支持 API。

span.span: Indicates that an API is supported for a specified platform or operating system.

summary.span: 如果指定了版本，则无法从早期版本调用 API。

span.span: If a version is specified, the API cannot be called from an earlier version.

summary.span: 可以应用多个属性来指示支持多个操作系统。

span.span: Multiple attributes can be applied to indicate support on multiple operating systems.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方可以应用 或使用保护来防止在不受支持的操作系统上调用 api。Callers can apply a or use guards to prevent calls to APIs on unsupported operating systems. 指定平台只应指定一次。A given platform should only be specified once.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string platformName) cil managed

param.name: platformName
param.span: 支持的 OS 平台名称，可以选择包括版本。

span.span: The supported OS platform name, optionally including a version.

summary.span: 为指定的受支持的 OS 平台初始化 属性类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the attribute class for the specified supported OS platform.
